item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, February 20, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump calls Zelenskyy a ‘dictator’ as US rift with Ukraine deepens
2. Russia’s executions of Ukrainian prisoners point to systematic policy
3. Microsoft claims quantum breakthrough after 20-year pursuit of elusive particle
4. Politico’s owner praises JD Vance for ‘inspiring message’
5. Trump makes push for control of independent US regulators
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, February 20, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
